title: Brady 124177 Bilingual Sign, Legend "Fire Door Do Not Block/Puerta De Emergencia No Obstruir", 7" Height, 10" Width, Red on White
features: Made of B-302 self sticking polyester material
Brady B-302 is an indoor/outdoor high performance pressure sensitive safety sign, and is surface printed polyester, with a polyester over laminate
B-302 has a cold temperature adhesive that makes the sign able to apply at 0-Degree F (-18-Degree Celsius)
description: Bilingual signs provide your facility with the appropriate Spanish safety message such as precaucion, peligro, securidad primero, aviso and advertencia. Available in a wide variety of materials, sizes and messages, Brady has the bilingual sign to meet your facility's need. Header:(no header). Legend: Fire Door Do Not Block/Puerta De Emergencia No Bloquear.
